sentences.en: A book was found amid the wreckage of the are.
sentences.cn: 一本书是在那车子残骸碎片之中发现的.

sentences.en: A few survivors were pulled from the wreckage.
sentences.cn: 从废墟中扒出了几个幸存者。

sentences.en: Boat wreckage is often dragged to shore and salvaged for parts.
sentences.cn: 一些失事船只的残骸被打捞上来,部分加以利用.

sentences.en: Firemen managed to pull some survivors from the wreckage.
sentences.cn: 消防队员设法从残骸中拖出了几名幸存者。

sentences.en: For three weeks a big operation went on to recover the wreckage from the sea bed.
sentences.cn: 打捞海底残骸这一浩大工程持续了三周。

sentences.en: Mark was dragged from the burning wreckage of his car.
sentences.cn: 马克被人从他着火的汽车残骸中拉了出来。

sentences.en: No wreckage could ever be found.
sentences.cn: 这就再也找不到(它的)残余了.

sentences.en: The driver had to be cut free from the wreckage of his car.
sentences.cn: 破开了汽车残骸才把司机解救出来.

sentences.en: The injured driver was cut from the wreckage of his car.
sentences.cn: 把汽车残骸破开才救出了受伤的司机.

sentences.en: The wreckage of the plane was put on display here Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 星期二,这里展出飞机的残骸.

sentences.en: They hauled him clear of the wreckage.
sentences.cn: 他们把他从形骸中拖出来.

sentences.en: Three people died as wreckage blazed, and rescuers fought to release trapped drivers.
sentences.cn: 汽车残骸熊熊燃烧，三人葬身火海，救援人员奋力解救被困的司机们。

sentences.en: We will now try to reassemble pieces of the wreckage.
sentences.cn: 我们现在会尽量把残骸重新组合起来。

sentences.en: Wilson poked about the wreckage, and then sighed.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊围着这一堆残骸转了一阵, 终于叹出了一口气.

sentences.en: Wreckage of the aircraft was scattered over a wide area.
sentences.cn: 那架飞机的残骸散布范围很大.

sentences.en: You can live in the wreckage and pretend it's still the mansion you remember.
sentences.cn: 你可以站在废墟前,假装这仍是你记忆中的大厦.

words.tran_cn: 失事的（船）；迷幻的，兴奋的
破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人
使船失事的人，肇事者；失事现场清理人；打捞船
失事，遇难；遇难船；营救难船
（失事船或飞机等的）残骸；（船只等的）失事

trans.tran_en: the parts of something such as a plane, ship, or building that are left after it has been destroyed in an accident
